Jacob Jedryszek

Software Engineer at Meta (Ex-MSFT). I helped build Azure Portal, Azure Mobile App, Seeing AI, and Facebook Marketplace.

Resume

Work experience

    • Worked on PCA Pump (Patient-Controlled Analgesia) prototype.
    • Worked on GNAT Programming Studio plugin (Bakar Kiasan) for static software analysis.
    • Technologies: SPARK Ada, AADL, Python (PyGTK, PyUnit), Java, Scala, Jenkins (Continuous Integration), bash.
  • SMT Software: Web Developer (3/2012 - 12/2012)
    • Worked on 3D Ledger for CreditSafe (credit reports provider). Live service maintenance.
    • Technologies: ASP.NET MVC, C#, WCF, HTML/CSS, JavaScript (jQuery, AJAX), Oracle.
  • Kansas State University - Communication and Marketing: Web Developer (9/2011 - 12/2011)
    • Worked on the Kansas State University websites and Campus Map.
    • Technologies: PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript (YUI), Google Maps API, Wordpress.
  • PGS Software: Web Developer Intern (10/2010 - 11/2010)
    • Worked on Yearbook Machine web application that enables people to create yearbook online.
    • Technologies: PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript(jQuery, AJAX).
